content:
Russian troops fired on Thursday afternoon, causing a taxi driver.

About thisreportedKherson Ova Chairman Alexander Proudin.

“Unfortunately, the driver of the car was killed on the spot. My condolences to my family and loved ones, ”the message reads.

Two passengers, a 36-year-old man and a 39-year-old woman-wounded. They were taken to the hospital where the victims are provided with medical care.

As reported by the Armyinform, as a result of Russian shelling of the village of Monachynivka of Kupyansk districtDied57-year-old local resident.
title: In Kherson, Russian invaders fired a taxi, died driver
description: This was reported by the head of the Kherson Ova Alexander Proudin. “Unfortunately, from the received ...
author: Army Inform
